name: MEC Besnow Long Jacket - Children
description:
One of our warmest offerings for the smaller set, the Besnow Jacket finds a balance between warmth for winter without too much weight. This longer version has blanket-like levels of coziness, and does great job sealing out the cold. Loaded with 550-fill certified responsible down this jacket keeps your little one toasty and packs well. The streamlined insulated hood adds warmth for tiny ears warm on fast sled runs and gusty days.Insulated with 550 fill-power duck down that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare.3-piece hood stays close to the head and snaps closed with a stealthy snap.Fleece lined pockets warm up cold hands and keep tiny treasures close.Quilted construction keeps the down in place.Front zipper has an insulated storm flap with hook-and-loop closure.Name tag on the inside, great for making play date or daycare pick-ups a little easier.Extra length = extra warmth.

        Sustainability












                      Certified Responsible Down
